description: Made from lightweight cotton jersey. Authentic tubular-knit construction is based on '40s basic training tees. Garment-dyed and heavily washed to achieve a broken-in look and feel.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 27½" body length (front and back), a 17" shoulder, and a 38½" chest.
"Ralph Lauren Est. 1993 RRL Double RL" printed at the center front.
